Reviews.Title: low shutter priority
Reviews.Author: Shorty Jones "Shorty Jones"
Reviews.Content: Camera prefers to shoot at low shutter speed 1/50 to 1/100 seconds;  thus resulting in motion blur. Even if you raise ISO to 800 it drops to f8 or even f10 and maintains low shutter speed. A low aperture (f4) priority would have been better. Auto focus not a problem except at maximum 5x zoom. I have yet to take a picture at 5x zoom that is in true focus.  If you hold the camera steady and not rely on zoom the results are fine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Overall Camera
Reviews.Author: Brianh
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera more than two months ago and I am very pleased with the purchase. First the Bad. There is no stereo sound on the video clips. The sound is a bit muffled. Not clear compared with previous camers I have owned. There is only a three shot burst mode. On Auto mode I am getting a mixed result at night. Few problems indoors. The battery life could be better. I am taking mainly night shots with the flash. I am getting about 100 shots and around 8-10 minutes of HD video, then on goes the red low battery indicator. During the day you should get more pics. I purchased a 16 GB class 10 memory card and the quality of video is off the charts good. As good as any camera in its class. To improve indoor and night shots you need to go to Program mode then set the ISO to 1600 or 3200. Do this and you night/indoor resolution will be very good. The optical zoom is excellent. But you may want to turn off the digital zoom and opt for optical only. Great results. Daytime/Outdoor shots are among the best I have seen. This camers requires a bit of work. There are around 20 shooting modes. Its a good idea to experiment with these. They are there for a reason. This can greatly improve results. Overall this is a great camera and for the price the JX580 is tough to beat.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Milady D
Reviews.Content: This a fine camera for the price. Takes fair pictures, wasn't expecting Nikon quality, of course, and certainly didn't get it:) The flash is a bit frightening it's so bright. Makes uploading photos to the computer very easy.

Reviews.Title: Fuji is a solid option
Reviews.Author: Christopher V Whitfield
Reviews.Content: I've had Fuji cameras since 2005.  The colors and photos look like film.  Nice design and reliable functionality. Great price for the product.

Reviews.Title: What a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Madeline Mulkey
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I chose this camera! I originally picked it for the reasonable price and was pleasantly surprised when I tried it and it produced the most wonderful photos. I recommend the Fujifilm camera to anyone looking for a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Bethany roy
Reviews.Content: Love the product works great! I would recommend it to anybody looking for a mid price camera keep in mind that the battery fits in both ways.  LOL I had it in backwards for about 6 hours as I tried to charge it.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift
Reviews.Author: sherrin connolly
Reviews.Content: The camera was met with great enthusiam by our 11 year old gradaughter. It is easy to use and she loves the results.

Reviews.Title: Sweet little camera
Reviews.Author: Mary G. Hutcherson "Happy Gal"
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera, just slips into my purse or pocket and I got an octopus that attaches easily to anything so I can use the timer setting to take pics the owner can also be in.  Quality is very good and it is the easiest one to use ever!  I also am delighted with the red color.  And what a bargain!

Reviews.Title: Great job!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Tomlinson
Reviews.Content: This was a gift and actually had more features than I was expecting.  Delivery was great and I will use you again soon.  Probably for the holidays.

Reviews.Title: for the money it's ok!
Reviews.Author: smurfette
Reviews.Content: I have always loved Fuji. a little difficult to use. Would not buy this certain camera again! But will continue to buy Fuji

Reviews.Title: the battery was not working
Reviews.Author: Eng. Kutela B
Reviews.Content: The battery was not working, i could not use it without direct connecting  to the electricity. But I returned and I was given my refund.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: L. Miller
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. I just opened the package, took the camera out and charged the battery. Took it with me the next day and point and shoot. The only thing I wish it had was a viewer to look through when the sun is hitting the led screen. But not a big deal. Also love that it uses standard SD cards.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Lucas
Reviews.Content: It would be nice to have a light for the video but other than that and I'm still trying to figure it out it take very nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: Fuji failure
Reviews.Author: THE GUNSMITH "lnc"
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm FinePix JX580 Digital Camera (Red)If you read all my reviews you will find I am not picky, and when i do get a good product I like to pass it on to others.So, since my sony pocket camera was only 7 mips I decided to upgrade to fuji JX580,with 5x and 3 inchwindow.Bought from amazon as my experience with Amazon is 5 star unqualified Maybe it is only the one jx580 I received but my experience with this camera is a horror show.I have decided my 7 umips with the sony was better than the JX 580.upgradeWhen the camera arrived,sounds of some operations were missing and could not be produced. But sound is not all that important to me so it was not enough reason to send the camera back. But maybe the camera was trying to tell me something,like flash unsyncronized with picture snap, light effects not exact.focusing problem.Last week I took the camera to a friends daughter first communion. I took maybe 50 pictures of which 5 were decent but not vivid.So into the waste basket with this junker.If you do go for this cameras check it out early for possible returnIroncrossguns

Reviews.Title: Good first camera for a 8 year old
Reviews.Author: Dawn O
Reviews.Content: This is a good first camera for a responsible child, but within a week of having it, the charging cord broke....the end just broke off....of course, no information in the provided manual, product insert, on Amazon in the product description, or on Fuji's website tells you what kind of charger it is......so instead of ordering a replacement online, we have to head to an electronics store to find a replacement.  It is sort of a cheap camera, but so is the price.....so the value meets the cost.  Overall, we are satisfied but not overwhelmed.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Richard R.Moodie
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend thst wanted a blue camera and she has not complain infact she said it is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: John Frey
Reviews.Content: The initial pictures I have taken with this camera were in the mountains. The upper mountains that were partially snow-covered disappeared into the sky, it didn't adjust well for the contrast. Other pictures were just ok. The automatic settings don't seem to work well, I will need to learn how to use the manual settings.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: tammy j leisure
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera I bought me one earlier this year and this one is a gift!!! This is very compact fits nicely in your jeans pocket and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: joel
Reviews.Content: es lo esperado buen producto todo bien  las foto  y  los videós excelente buenas  imagen  funciona bien  buen  vendedor excelente

Reviews.Title: fine pix jx580
Reviews.Author: anne walter
Reviews.Content: i just gotta say that when my daughter came home and said her dad told her he was impressed with my pick, i was floored.

Reviews.Title: The picture quality is bad.
Reviews.Author: leeanne
Reviews.Content: I am not at all pleased with this camera. The picture quality sucks. I wish i had bought something elese.

ProductInfo.Features:
3-inch LCD display
High Quality Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens
16MP CCD
HD Movies (720p)
Li-Ion Battery
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix JX580 Digital Camera (Black)
